alert.note: Alert for Ketchikan Gateway Borough (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 05 at 1:55PM AKST until December 07 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Ward Lake near Areas Near The Ward Lake Recreational Area. * WHEN...Until 315 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 152 PM AKST, satellite estimates and rain gauge data indicate heavy rain across the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly, especially near Ward Lake. Between 2.25 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
